entry.title: 53_Maximum_Subarray
entry.content: 53. Maximum Subarray Find the contiguous subarray within an array (containing at least one number) which has the largest sum.For example, given the array [-2,1,-3,4,-1,2,1,-5,4],the contiguous subarray [4,-1,2,1] has the largest sum = 6. 123456789101112131415161718# @param {Integer[]} nums# @return {Integer}def max_sub_array(nums) return 0 if nums.empty? || nums.length == 0 globalMax = -(2**(0.size * 8 -2)) # globalMax = 0 curMax = 0 for i in 0..nums.length - 1 do # p curMax # p nums[i] curMax = curMax + nums[i] globalMax = [globalMax, curMax].max if curMax < 0 curMax = 0 end end return globalMaxend

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
